mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.author_id, a.author_type, a.content_text, a.cover_img1_url, a.cover_img2_url, a.cover_img3_url, a.cover_img4_url, a.cover_img5_url, a.cover_img6_url, a.cover_img7_url, a.cover_img8_url, a.cover_img9_url, a.create_time, a.pub_time, a.source_url, a.title, a.video_url FROM c_articles a WHERE a.is_delete = 0 order by a.pub_time desc

SELECT a.id, a.author_id, a.author_type, a.content_text, a.cover_img1_url, a.cover_img2_url, a.cover_img3_url, a.cover_img4_url, a.cover_img5_url, a.cover_img6_url, a.cover_img7_url, a.cover_img8_url, a.cover_img9_url, a.create_time, a.pub_time, a.source_url, a.title, a.video_url FROM c_articles a WHERE a.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
